item.description:
Meet Mountaineer Lei Wang (王雷)

Meet Lei Wang, a mountaineer who has climbed six of the highest peaks on the seven continents and has skied both the North and South Poles. She is one summit away, Mount Everest to accomplish her life-long dream and a world record. To date, only 10 people in the world have finished both the Seven Summits and the Two Poles (Seven Plus Two). She will be the first Asian American woman to accomplish this challenge. Lei will share her journey and the adventures she has experienced. www.leisventures.com

One summit away to become the first Asian American woman to conquer Seven Summits and Two Poles.

Time: 6 to 8 pm
There will be some light refreshments served.

BCNC
38 Ash Street, Boston, MA
(off Oak Street, between Washington St. and Harrison Ave. T stop at Tufts Medical Center)

This event is free and open to the public.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Meet Mountaineer Lei Wang
